class.name: AnimationNodeStateMachine
class.brief_description: State machine for control of animations.
class.description: Contains multiple nodes representing animation states, connected in a graph. Node transitions can be configured to happen automatically or via code, using a shortest-path algorithm. Retrieve the [AnimationNodeStateMachinePlayback] object from the [AnimationTree] node to control it programmatically. [b]Example:[/b] [codeblocks] [gdscript] var state_machine = $AnimationTree.get("parameters/playback") state_machine.travel("some_state") [/gdscript] [csharp] var stateMachine = GetNode<AnimationTree>("AnimationTree").Get("parameters/playback") as AnimationNodeStateMachinePlayback; stateMachine.Travel("some_state"); [/csharp] [/codeblocks]

method.name: add_node
method.description: Adds a new node to the graph. The [code]position[/code] is used for display in the editor.

method.name: add_transition
method.description: Adds a transition between the given nodes.

method.name: get_end_node
method.description: Returns the graph's end node.

method.name: get_graph_offset
method.description: Returns the draw offset of the graph. Used for display in the editor.

method.name: get_node
method.description: Returns the animation node with the given name.

method.name: get_node_name
method.description: Returns the given animation node's name.

method.name: get_node_position
method.description: Returns the given node's coordinates. Used for display in the editor.

method.name: get_start_node
method.description: Returns the graph's end node.

method.name: get_transition
method.description: Returns the given transition.

method.name: get_transition_count
method.description: Returns the number of connections in the graph.

method.name: get_transition_from
method.description: Returns the given transition's start node.

method.name: get_transition_to
method.description: Returns the given transition's end node.

method.name: has_node
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the graph contains the given node.

method.name: has_transition
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if there is a transition between the given nodes.

method.name: remove_node
method.description: Deletes the given node from the graph.

method.name: remove_transition
method.description: Deletes the transition between the two specified nodes.

method.name: remove_transition_by_index
method.description: Deletes the given transition by index.

method.name: rename_node
method.description: Renames the given node.

method.name: set_end_node
method.description: Sets the given node as the graph end point.

method.name: set_graph_offset
method.description: Sets the draw offset of the graph. Used for display in the editor.

method.name: set_node_position
method.description: Sets the node's coordinates. Used for display in the editor.

method.name: set_start_node
method.description: Sets the given node as the graph start point.
